axisId.description: The id of the axis used for the reference value.

classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.

label.description: The label to display along the reference line.

labelAlign.description: The alignment if the label in the chart drawing area.

labelStyle.description: The style applied to the label

lineStyle.description: The style applied to the line

spacing.description: Additional Space between the label and the reference line in px.

x.description: The x value associated to the reference line. If defined the reference line will be vertical.

y.description: The y value associated to the reference line. If defined the reference line will be horizontal.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.
